section.title: LibSVM Interface
section.para: This is an &ffi-pac;-based interface to the version 2.82 of LibSVM (included in the sources, so you do not need to install it yourself).
The package LIBSVM is case-sensitive, and you do not need the svm_ prefix for the functions described in modules/libsvm/README.
section.simpara: When this module is present, &features-var; contains the symbol :LIBSVM.

section.title: Types
section.para: All data is kept on the &c-lang; side as much as possible, so these foreign types do &not-e; have a &clos; counterpart.

listitem.simpara: Corresponds to svm_node, represented as a &list-t; on the lisp side.
Corresponds to svm_problem, represented as a &list-t; on the lisp side.
Corresponds to svm_parameter, represented as a &vector-t; on the lisp side.
Corresponds to svm_model, an opaque pointer.
Return the number of rows in the &problem-r; (a &foreign-variable-t;)
